title: Strawberry Shortcake: Berry in the Big City
overview: A fresh new day, sweet dreams to chase, this berry is on a mission to bake the world a better place. It's Strawberry Shortcake. She'll make a difference, see it through, show the world what she can do. Get ready because she is back again! The fun adventures will never end in Big Apple City. She is making friends all over town, her smile is so bright everything is much more fun when she is around. She is the very best baker and a better friend to Orange Blossom, Blueberry Muffin, Lime Chiffon and Lemon Meringue. Welcome to the new world of Strawberry Shortcake: Berry in the Big City.
